control of output collected fluxes type, either C/m2/s = A/m2 (i.e. a current) or #/m2/s (i.e. a flux), 1=currents, 2=fluxes, 4=automatic (from known particle type)

cumulate currents and densities at the end of simulation ? 0=no, 1or2=yes

plot log10 of currents? 0=no, 1=yes(log only), 2=both

maximal number of particle trajectories followed per PIC population

gamma adiabatic exponent in the variable Te law
if 1 linear Poisson solver, if 0 non-linear
flag for vacuum computation (0=off, 1=on), if on and linearPoisson is on solves Laplace equation, if on and linearPoisson is off only sets ion space charge to zero in Poisson eq.
flag to use a variable Te in Boltzmann equation (physically meaningless), 0=off, 1=on
constant in the variable Te law

Tolerance for linear system solver (used for capacitance matrix inversion)
Maximum iteration number for Newton algorithm in non-linear Poisson solving
neutrality switch, 0=off => regular Poisson computation, 1=on => imposes neutrality instead of solving Poisson
Poisson boundary conditions type, see documentation

flag to define the circuit solver mode: 0 => implicit solver, 1 => explicit solver
flag to desactivate the dI/dV calculation: 0 => activated, 1 => disactivated (zero current variation asumed in the implicit circuit solver)
flag to have fixed integration duration dt of all populations (if yes, durations will be each population dtMax) (0=no, 1=yes)

(possible) scenario for the simulation
